title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) in Nigeria 2024
yAxis: Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars. In total the number of data points it has is 31.
In general Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1998 and 1999.
The highest Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars, of value 762.02 was reached at Year 2024
Minimum Gross domestic product in billion U.S. dollars about 57.48 was reached at Year 1999
